server.facade

Class ServerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.facade.AbstractServerFacade
      • server.facade.ServerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameFacade, IGamesFacade, IMovesFacade, IUserFacade

    public class ServerFacade
extends AbstractServerFacade
    The actual Facade that interacts for real.

    • Method Detail

      • getGameState

        public ClientModel getGameState(int gameID,
                                int version)
        Description copied from interface: IGameFacade
        Retrieves the current GameplayState
        version - the version to check the game against.
        Returns:
        the current GameplayState. If the version in the server's game is older than the version supplied, null is returned to indicate that nothing has changed.

        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the playing doing the robbing.
        victim - the index of the player being robbed.
        location - the new location of the robber.

      • buildRoad

        public ClientModel buildRoad(int gameID,
                             PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                             EdgeLocation roadLocation,
                             boolean free)
                      throws CatanException
        Description copied from interface: IMovesFacade
        Increase the client player's road of AmountType.BUILT by 1. Decrease the client player's road of AmountType.AVAILABLE by 1. Update the map with a new road.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player building the road.
        roadLocation - the location where the road is being built.
        free - if the road is free (only in setup state).
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

                               PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                               boolean willAccept)
                        throws CatanException
        Description copied from interface: IMovesFacade
        Update model and remove the TradeOffer Update both players' PlayerBank depending on whether the TradeOffer is accepted or not.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player sending the command.
        willAccept - whether or not the player will accept the trade offered them.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • maritimeTrade

        public ClientModel maritimeTrade(int gameID,
                                 PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                                 TradeRatio ratio,
                                 ResourceType inputResource,
                                 ResourceType outputResource)
                          throws CatanException
        Description copied from interface: IMovesFacade
        The client player trades with the game bank based on the trade ratio that is available to the player
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player doing the trade.
        ratio - the ratio at which to trade.
        inputResource - the resource the player is trading away.
        outputResource - the resource the player is trading for.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • discardCards

        public ClientModel discardCards(int gameID,
                                PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                                Resources discardedCards)
                         throws CatanException
        Description copied from interface: IMovesFacade
        The client player discards a number of each resource. The resources are returned to the game bank
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player discarding.
        discardedCards - the cards discarded.
        Returns:
        the updated CLientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException
